description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at what Ubisoft, who as a publisher and massive arm in gaming is apparently on the way out with numerous failed projects and a stock value that has the company looking for a buyout could be one of the biggest gaming failures we've seen in a long time. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Ubisoft Is On Life Support...
